q: Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. Previous article Factsheet: Mitsubishi Lancer Sportback Ralliart

But in all other cases, the videos are`` heavily edited and manipulated,'' said Planned Parenthood spokesman Stuart Schear. The organization is not credible and their tapes can not be trusted, Schear said. The debate is not likely to die down quickly. Cliff Stearns , chairman of the House Energy and Commerce Committee's oversight panel, said he planned to call Health and Human Services Secretary Mike Pence

companies.`` I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped,'' said Ken Auletta , author of`` Googled: The End of the World As We Know It.'' I think Eric Schmidt is burned out. There have been signs Eric Schmidt would prefer doing something else. For the first time last year, he started to sit out of Google Inc. 's quarterly calls to discuss its earnings.
